name: @snowcrystals/icicle
readme:
@snowcrystals/icicle

The bridge between code and terminal to print beautiful messages ðŸŽ¨


--- ## Information @snowcrystals/icicle is a logger package which you can use to print beautiful messages in the console. Apart from serving as a basic logger it also has a couple customisable settings. ## Install ``` npm i @snowcrystals/icicle yarn add @snowcrystals/icicle pnpm add @snowcrystals/icicle ``` The following example is written using TypeScript, check the documentation for more information. ```ts import { Logger } from "@snowcrystals/icicle"; const icicle = new Logger(); icicle.info("Hello World!"); // 2022-11-25 20:18:33 [INFO] Â» Hello World! ``` ### Documentation The documentation (API Reference) can be found on our [website](https://snowcrystals.dev/docs/icicle) ## Author ðŸ‘¤ **ijsKoud** - Website: https://ijskoud.dev/ - Email: - Twitter: [@ijsKoud](https://ijskoud.dev/twitter) - Github: [@ijsKoud](https://github.com/ijsKoud) ## Donate This will always be open source project, even if I don't receive donations. But there are still people out there that want to donate, so if you do here is the link [PayPal](https://ijskoud.dev/paypal) or to [Ko-Fi](https://ijskoud.dev/kofi). Thanks in advance! I really appriciate it <3 ## License Project is licensed under the Â© [**MIT License**](/LICENSE) ---

blockTags.name: example
blockTags.text:
```typescript
const logger = new Logger({ name: "SERVER" });
logger.info("Hello World!"); // 2022-11-25 20:18:33 INFO Â» [SERVER]: Hello World!
```

The stream for the error logs

The background color, e.g. `magenta` or `red`

The text color, e.g. `red` or `yellow`
